author: Jack Power
title: Coronavirus: More than 500,000 people claim pandemic payment
description: Hardware stores should only open for emergencies and deliveries, Government says
content:
More than 500,000 people have claimed the 350 weekly pandemic unemployment payment.
Speaking at a Government press briefing, assistant general secretary at the Department of Taoiseach Liz Canavan said 584,000 people have claimed the payment - an increase of … [+3215 chars]
